name: Eastern Water Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing female airbenders.

name: Western Water Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing female airbenders.

name: Southern Water Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing male airbenders. Childhood home of Avatar Aang.

name: Northern Water Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing male airbenders.

name: Foggy Swamp
description: Place for immigrants of the Southern Water Tribe with an extensive array of fauna and flora.

name: Spirit Oasis
description: A verdant and lush garden located in a cave in the Northern Water Tribe's capital city at the North Pole.

name: Northern Water Tribe
description: The largest division of its nation and is located on an island situated near the North Pole.

name: Southern Water Tribe
description: Minor division of the Water Tribe. Its people are scattered in tiny villages and settlements located on an island by the South Pole.

name: Si Wong Desert
description: The largest desert in the world.

name: Ba Sing Se
description: The monolithic capital of the Earth Kingdom.

name: Kyoshi Island
description: Famous as the birthplace of Avatar Kyoshi and as the home of the elite Kyoshi Warriors.

name: Omashu
description: The second largest city in the Earth Kingdom and the capital of one of its provinces ruled by King Bumi.

name: Fire Nation Capital
description: The seat of the government for the Fire Nation

name: Boiling Rock
description: A massive Fire Nation prison.

name: Sun Warriors' Ancient City
description: Large, historic settlement located on an island north of the Fire Nation mainland.

name: Fire Fountain City
description: A large industrial city located in the Fire Nation.

name: Lion Turtle
description: The largest known animal in the world served as protectors of mankind by housing human cities on their backs.

name: Air Temple Island
description: A small isle located off the coast of Republic City in Yue Bay.

name: Southern Water Tribe Compound
description: A small encampment that lies deep within the South Pole, near the harbor city in the Southern Water Tribe.

name: Shipwreck
description: A massive Fire Nation naval vessel tilted and uprooted by the waterbenders of the Southern Water Tribe.

name: Gaoling
description: A large town located within a mountain range in the southern Earth Kingdom.

name: Plains Village
description: Located in the arid grasslands of the southern Earth Kingdom, to the west of the Si Wong Desert.

name: Ember Island
description: A small resort, home to many luxurious resorts and vacation homes for the wealthy and powerful.

name: Shu Jing
description: Situated on a cliff above a river and waterfalls and surrounded by beautiful mountains.

name: Wulong Forest
description: The location of the final battle of the Hundred Year War between Fire Lord Ozai and Avatar Aang.

name: Spirit World
description: A parallel plane of reality that coexist alongside the physical world inhabited by humans.

name: Scorched Forest
description: A region of hilly and expansive woodland located in the vicinity of Senlin Village in the southern United Republic of Nations.

name: Avatar Korra Park
description: A large recreational area located in Republic City's central peninsula.

name: United Republic of Nations
description: A sovereign state created by Avatar Aang and Fire Lord Zuko after the end of the Hundred Year War.

name: Aang Memorial Island
description: A small island located in Yue Bay that its statue stands as a symbol of peace and goodwill.

name: Fog of Lost Souls
description: A boundless prison for humans located within the Spirit World.

name: Spirit Portal
description: A gateway that connects the physical world and Spirit World.
